items.sentence: What much of the world calls football is called soccer in America.
You might be interested to know that Tom just broke out of prison.
Tom saw Mary walking to the bus stop and ran to catch up with her.
Tom understands French a lot better than everybody thinks he does.
Tom wanted to impress his girlfriend, but she only laughed at him.
I think we may have something that you\'d be interested in buying.
Tom was the first one to realize that Mary wasn\'t having any fun.
Mary\'s husband didn\'t even stick around until the baby was born.
I wasn\'t very hungry when I got home, but I\'m really hungry now.
Recently, no matter how much I sleep, it never seems to be enough.
